caption.title: Competition of fluorescently marked virus (λCFP and λYFP—blue and green areas) during invasion into uninfected cells (black areas) at different degrees of mixing ( undisturbed, 30s, 24h, 24h-wet).
caption.p: (A) Undisturbed environment—Circular epidemic front segregates into single-virus sectors (blue and green sectors, white arrow depicts the centre of epidemic inoculation). (B) 30s disturbance—Epidemic clusters that are dominated by a single type of virus appear. (C,D) Longer periods of disturbance ( 24h) and a liquid surface layer ( 24h-wet) progressively homogenize the spatial genetic structure of virus types.
